001package gust.backend.model;
002
003
004import com.google.protobuf.FieldMask;
005
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009
010/**
011 * Specifies options which may be applied, generically, to model instance fetch operations implemented through the
012 * {@link PersistenceDriver} interface.
013 */
014public interface FetchOptions extends CacheOptions, OperationOptions {
015  /** Default set of fetch options. */
016  FetchOptions DEFAULTS = new FetchOptions() {};
017
018  /** Enumerates ways the {@code FieldMask} may be applied. */
019  enum MaskMode {
020    /** Only include fields mentioned in the field mask. */
021    INCLUDE,
022
023    /** Omit fields mentioned in the field mask. */
024    EXCLUDE,
025
026    /** Treat the field mask as a projection, for query purposes only. */
027    PROJECTION
028  }
029
030  /** @return Field mask to apply when fetching properties. Fields not mentioned in the mask will be omitted. */
031  default @Nonnull Optional<FieldMask> fieldMask() {
032    return Optional.empty();
033  }
034
035  /** @return Mode to operate in when applying the affixed field mask, if any. */
036  default @Nonnull MaskMode fieldMaskMode() {
037    return MaskMode.INCLUDE;
038  }
039}
